com.cloudera.director.spi.v2.provider

Interface InstanceProvider<I extends Instance<T>,T extends InstanceTemplate>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ResourceProvider<I,T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ComputeProvider<R,T>, DatabaseServerProvider<R,T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractComputeProvider, AbstractDatabaseServerProvider, AbstractInstanceProvider

    public interface InstanceProvider<I extends Instance<T>,T extends InstanceTemplate>
extends ResourceProvider<I,T>
    Represents a provider of instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,InstanceState> getInstanceState(T template, Collection<String> instanceIds)
      Returns a map from instance identifiers to instance state for the specified instances.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.cloudera.director.spi.v2.provider.ResourceProvider

        allocate, createResourceTemplate, delete, find, getLocalizationContext, getProviderMetadata, getResourceTemplateLocalizationContext, getResourceType, validateResourceTemplateConfiguration

    • Method Detail

      • getInstanceState

        Map<String,InstanceState> getInstanceState(T template,
                                           Collection<String> instanceIds)
        Returns a map from instance identifiers to instance state for the specified instances. Preconditions: 1. if template.isAutomatic is true, then instanceIds are a collection of provider-specific instance Ids 2. if template.isAutomatic is false, currently the instances are a collection of virtual instance Ids
        Parameters:
        template - the resource template used for create the instances
        instanceIds - the unique identifiers for the instances
        Returns:
        the map from instance identifiers to instance state for the specified batch of instances
